name: git-tools
description: - Place these scripts somewhere on your path. - Run `npm install inquirer` on the same directory where you have copied them - Pro-tip: remove the '.js' extension of 'issue.js', 'pr.js' and 'prc.js'

scripts.install:bin: npm install && cp misc.js ~/bin/misc.js && cp issue.js ~/bin/issue && cp pr.js ~/bin/pr && cp prc.js ~/bin/prc && cp -r node_modules ~/bin && chmod +x ~/bin/issue && chmod +x ~/bin/pr && chmod +x ~/bin/prc
